eshmun.modelrepair.sat

Class CNFStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • eshmun.modelrepair.sat.CNFStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class CNFStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    A CNF Stream, streams the repair formula to SAT Solver.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kinan Dak Al Bab

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> clauseList
      list of clauses, each has the given specific format:
      Each variable is represented by a number (its ID) starting from 1. If a variable is negated, a - sign is put in front of it (no space between). The clause is terminated by a zero.
      private int currentbyte
      the current character inside a clause.
      private int currentClause
      the current clause being read from.
      private byte[] header
      the header of the problem, has the given specific format:
      p cnf #of variables #of clauses
      private int numberOfClauses
      The number of clauses in the formula.
      private int numberOfLiterals
      The number of literals in the formula.

      Constructs a new CNF Stream, for the given problem.

    • Field Detail

      • header

        private byte[] header
        the header of the problem, has the given specific format:
        p cnf #of variables #of clauses

      • clauseList

        private java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> clauseList
        list of clauses, each has the given specific format:
        • Each variable is represented by a number (its ID) starting from 1.
        • If a variable is negated, a - sign is put in front of it (no space between).
        • The clause is terminated by a zero.

      • currentClause

        private int currentClause
        the current clause being read from. -1 represents the header, anything else is in the clause.

      • currentbyte

        private int currentbyte
        the current character inside a clause.

      • numberOfClauses

        private int numberOfClauses
        The number of clauses in the formula.

      • numberOfLiterals

        private int numberOfLiterals
        The number of literals in the formula.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CNFStream

        public CNFStream(int numberOfVariable,
                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> clauseList)
        Constructs a new CNF Stream, for the given problem.
        Parameters:
        numberOfVariable - number of distinct variables in the problem.
        clauseList - the clauses of the problem, in format.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public int read()
         throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the problem byte after byte.
        Specified by:
        read in class java.io.InputStream
        Returns:
        the byte currently read, -1 if the end was reached.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something wrong occurs.

      • getNumberOfClauses

        public int getNumberOfClauses()
        Returns:
        The number of clauses in the CNF Formula.

      • getNumberOfLiterals

        public int getNumberOfLiterals()
        Returns:
        The number of literals in the CNF Formula.
